entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -28.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
